page.title: 07Amenities in Sedgley (5)
page.content:
{Telephone Boxes: { I use{telephone boxes}if I need to phone home quickly also I can get the {operator}for information and for the {fire-services,ambulances, and police if there was an{emergency}or someone was to get into{trouble.
{Shops: { Some{shops}only sell certain things so that people are sure they will sell goods.
{Dentist: { The{Dentist}is someone who looks after your teeth.If your{teeth}grow out of place a{brace}can be fixed on to help them grow back.Also{cavities can be{stopped.
